name: link-gofer
description: browser extension and small native application to open links using the systems default
author: kinghat <kinghat@protonmail.com> (https://github.com/kinghat)

scripts.build-app:all: yarn build-app:linux && yarn build-app:macos && yarn build-app:win
scripts.build-app:linux: rm -rf builds/binaries/linux && pkg app/package.json --target node12-linux-x64 --output builds/binaries/linux/link-gofer
scripts.build-app:macos: rm -rf builds/binaries/macos && pkg app/package.json --target node12-macos-x64 --output builds/binaries/macos/link-gofer
scripts.build-app:win: rm -rf builds/binaries/windows && pkg app/package.json --target node12-win-x64 --output builds/binaries/windows/link-gofer
